about.summary: R-based solution for symbolic differentiation. It admits user-defined function as well as function substitution in arguments of functions to be differentiated. Some symbolic simplification is part of the work.

R-based solution for symbolic differentiation. It admits user-defined function as well as function substitution in arguments of functions to be differentiated. Some symbolic simplification is part of the work.

name: r-deriv
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.1.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-deriv
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Deriv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/Deriv/Deriv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: dbdbf5ed8babf706373ae33a937d013c46110a490aa821bcd158a70f761d0f8c

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('Deriv')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('Deriv')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Deriv
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: R-based solution for symbolic differentiation. It admits user-defined function as well as function substitution in arguments of functions to be differentiated. Some symbolic simplification is part of the work.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
